subject: Baseball
World Series
lead_paragraph: One member of the Giants’ oddball bullpen, reliever Jeremy Affeldt, avoided a brawl in the N.L.C.S. to send the team to a win.
snippet: One member of the Giants’ oddball bullpen, reliever Jeremy Affeldt, avoided a brawl in the N.L.C.S. to send the team to a win.
